task.title: Task: Start Access
task.shortdesc: Instructions on how to start Access.

taskbody.context: The possibilities to start Access depend on the way the system is installed. This course assumes a default installation of Microsoft English on a system with Windows 7 English. On almost all computers Access can be started through the start button of Windows and this method is described here. The most convenient start is through a shortcut on the desktop or through a button on the task bar.

stepresult.p: The initial screen of Access is displayed. In the left part (under Recent) are the last opened files and the right part contains some available templates for creating new databases.
